sn1.76:4.1: “What gets old, what doesn’t get old?
sn1.76:4.3: What’s a roadblock for skillful qualities?
sn1.76:4.4: What is ending day and night?
sn1.76:5.1: How many holes are there in the world,
sn1.76:5.3: We’ve come to ask the Buddha;
sn1.76:5.4: how are we to understand this?”
sn1.76:6.1: “The physical form of mortals gets old,
sn1.76:6.2: but their name and clan don’t.
sn1.76:7.2: Youth is ending day and night.
sn1.76:7.3: Women are the stain of celibacy,
sn1.76:8.1: There are six holes in the world,
sn1.76:8.6: You should completely get rid of these holes!”
